title: Email/Password Authentication Success
description: Verify successful sign-in with valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-in page.
Input valid registered email and correct password.
Click on the sign-in button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to their dashboard or appropriate page based on plan.

title: Email/Password Authentication Failure
description: Verify error feedback is shown for invalid email or password in sign-in.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-in page.
Input registered email with incorrect password.
Click on the sign-in button.
Verify error message related to invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Google OAuth Sign-In Success
description: Verify successful sign-in via Google OAuth using the GoogleSignInButton.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-in page.
Click the GoogleSignInButton component.
Complete Google OAuth sign-in flow.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected appropriately based on their subscription plan.

title: Session Persistence Across Page Reloads
description: Execute tests to ensure user authentication session persists across page reloads, maintaining logged-in state.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials.
Reload the page.
Verify user remains authenticated without requiring to log in again.

title: Plan Gating - Free User Redirect from Dashboard
description: Verify that users with Free plan get redirected from dashboard to upgrade page with clear CTAs.

steps.description: Log in as a user subscribed under the Free plan.
Navigate or attempt to access the dashboard page.
Verify user is redirected to upgrade page with appropriate call-to-action prompts.

title: Plan Access - Starter and Higher Dashboard Access
description: Verify users with Starter, Pro, or Premium plans can access the dashboard with personalized analytics.

steps.description: Log in as a user on Starter plan.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify dashboard loads successfully with relevant analytics and controls.

title: Plan Upgrade Workflow
description: Validate user flow when upgrading subscription plan from Free to Starter or higher, including frontend gating and backend updates.

steps.description: Log in as Free plan user.
Navigate to pricing or upgrade page.
Select an upgrade plan and complete upgrade workflow.
Verify plan upgrade is reflected in user context and gated content is accessible post-upgrade.

title: Responsive Layout Rendering
description: Verify UI layout responsiveness across different viewport sizes and devices including sidebar, header, and content area.

steps.description: Load the app in desktop width viewport.
Verify sidebar, header, and content areas render correctly and are usable.
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile widths.
Verify layout adapts appropriately with navigation accessible and content visible.

title: Theme System Switching
description: Test dark, light, and system-preference themes via ThemeSwitcher component and verify correct theme application.

steps.description: Toggle ThemeSwitcher to 'dark' theme.
Verify UI colors and styles update to dark mode.
Toggle ThemeSwitcher to 'light' theme.
Verify UI colors and styles update to light mode.
Set theme preference to 'system' and change OS/system theme.
Verify UI theme matches current system preference automatically.

title: Internationalization Language Switching
description: Validate LanguageSelector changes the app language dynamically and multi-language content displays correctly.

steps.description: Select a supported language from LanguageSelector.
Verify UI text switches to selected language everywhere consistently.
Switch to another language and execute the above assertion again.

title: Currency Management Switching
description: Validate CurrencySwitcher changes the currency format dynamically and relevant pricing/financial data updates accordingly.

steps.description: Select a global currency from CurrencySwitcher.
Verify pricing and financial amounts display according to selected currency including correct symbol and formatting.
Switch to another currency and verify changes reflect accordingly.

title: PWA Installation and Offline Caching
description: Test the PWA installability on Android/iOS devices and ensure offline caching works via service workers.

steps.description: Access the app on supported mobile device or emulator.
Trigger the PWA install prompt and complete installation.
Verify the app installs and launches as a PWA.
Use the app online to load pages.
Turn device connectivity off.
Navigate to previously visited pages.
Verify offline caching serves content properly and the app does not crash.

title: Branding Assets Load Correctly
description: Validate SVG logos, favicons, and PWA icons load without 404 errors, are properly optimized and display correctly in the UI.

steps.description: Load landing page and all major app routes.
Verify no 404 or loading errors for brand assets in console and visually confirm correct branding asset display.

title: Hero Logo Animation with Accessibility Respect
description: Verify hero section's logo animation includes fade and scale effects and respects user's prefers-reduced-motion setting.

steps.description: Load landing page with default motion settings.
Verify logo animation fade and scale transitions complete smoothly.
Enable prefers-reduced-motion in device or browser settings.
Verify animations reduce or disable appropriately according to user preference.

title: Routing Protected Routes Enforcement
description: Verify protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to sign-in and free-plan users to upgrade page where applicable.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard route while not authenticated.
Verify redirection to sign-in page occurs.
Log in as free plan user and access dashboard route.
Verify redirection to upgrade page occurs.

title: Error Boundary Stability
description: Inject runtime error in a child component and verify the error boundary catches it and displays fallback UI without crashing the app.

steps.description: Cause a controlled JavaScript error in a nested UI component.
Verify ErrorBoundary catches the error and displays an error message UI.

title: Authentication Form Validation Feedback
description: Verify comprehensive validation feedback and error messages are shown for invalid input in sign-up and sign-in forms.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-up page.
Input invalid email format and weak password.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify relevant validation error messages are displayed and submission is blocked.

title: Accessibility Focus and Labels
description: Verify all interactive elements including links, buttons, and inputs have visible focus outlines and proper ARIA labels or accessible names.

steps.description: Tab through all interactive elements on landing and authentication pages.
Verify focus outlines are visible on all keyboard focused elements.
Verify screen reader accessible names or labels are present on inputs and buttons.

title: Lighthouse Performance and Accessibility Score
description: Run Lighthouse audit on landing and dashboard pages to verify performance ≥ 90, accessibility, and best practices compliance.

steps.description: Open landing page and run Lighthouse audit.
Performance score is 90 or above; accessibility and best practices scores meet or exceed thresholds.
Log in and open dashboard page, then run Lighthouse audit.
Performance score is 90 or above; accessibility and best practices scores meet or exceed thresholds.

title: Console Free of Errors and Warnings
description: Verify no console errors or warnings appear during navigation across all routes including landing, authentication, dashboard, and upgrade flows.

steps.description: Navigate sequentially through landing page, sign-in, sign-up, dashboard, upgrade, and profile pages.
Verify browser console shows no errors or warnings throughout.

title: Manifest and Service Worker Configuration
description: Verify manifest file includes required icons with proper maskable settings and service worker registers only in production environment.

steps.description: Inspect manifest.json for presence of required icons and maskable configuration.
Verify all icons are included and maskable property is set properly.
Run app in development and production build environments.
Verify service worker is registered only in the production build.
